<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Recuperar um trace"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v0/traces/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retorna um trace especifico.


**Escopo requerido**

| Valor | Descrição |
|---|---|
| `open:trace:read` | Permite listar os traces |

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"format":"uuid4","title":"Id","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
